title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Navigating Transportation Data: Covering Accidents and Infrastructure
description: A guide to using various transportation databases for reporting on vehicle accidents and infrastructure, including federal and state data on truck accidents, bridge inspections, railroad accidents, and highway repair data.
